output.description: The public URL of the audio file saved to Google Cloud Storage
output.title: Public URL

meta.name: Text to Speech
meta.description: Converts text to speech using ElevenLabs API and saves the output to Google Cloud Storage

group.name: ElevenLabs
group.description: Nodes for utilizing ElevenLabs Text to Speech capabilities in your workflow

fileName.description:
The name of the mp3 file.

EXAMPLE: `testing.mp3` or `audioTTS/testing.mp3`.
fileName.title: File Name

apiKey.description: The API key for ElevenLabs. (Get your API key from the [ElevenLabs Developer Dashboard](https://elevenlabs.io/). Login / Signup and click on Profile Settings to reveal your API Key.)
apiKey.title: API Key

voice_id.description: The ID of the voice to be used for speech synthesis. Check all the available voices [here](https://api.elevenlabs.io/v1/voices).
voice_id.title: Voice ID

optimize_streaming_latency.description: Optimization level for streaming latency from 0 (lowest) to 4 (highest).
optimize_streaming_latency.title: Optimize Streaming Latency

text.description: The text to be converted to speech
text.title: Text

apiKey.description: The API key for ElevenLabs. (Get your API key from the [ElevenLabs Developer Dashboard](https://elevenlabs.io/). Login / Signup and click on Profile Settings to reveal your API Key.)
apiKey.title: API Key

stream.description:
This input accepts a stream of text as input.

**TIP ðŸ’¡:** Use the **OpenAI Stream Response** node as the input here.
stream.title: Stream

voice_id.description: The ID of the voice to be used for speech synthesis. Check all the available voices [here](https://api.elevenlabs.io/v1/voices).
voice_id.title: Voice ID

optimize_streaming_latency.description: Optimization level for streaming latency from 0 (lowest) to 4 (highest).
optimize_streaming_latency.title: Optimize Streaming Latency

meta.name: Stream TTS Audio
meta.description:
Converts a stream of text to a stream of speech using ElevenLabs API.

The speech stream is mp3 encoded.

group.name: ElevenLabs
group.description: Nodes for utilizing ElevenLabs Text to Speech capabilities in your workflow
